content.prompt: Which of the following best explains the situation that prompted the doctor to write the letter?

choices.label: Advances in medical science were significantly increasing the cost of medical care.
British doctors and health services were significantly strained by the Second World War.
The loss of British colonies during the decolonization movement after the Second World War strained British resources.
The British government significantly expanded its role in the economy after the Second World War by creating a welfare state.

skill.text: Skill 2.C: Explain the significance of a source's point of view, purpose, historical situation, and/or audience, including how these might limit the use(s) of a source.
